TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void QueryContinueDragEventHandler(object sender, QueryContinueDragEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed QueryContinueDragEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub QueryContinueDragEventHandler(sender As Object, e As QueryContinueDragEventArgs)
public delegate void QueryContinueDragEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, QueryContinueDragEventArgs ^ e);
type QueryContinueDragEventHandler = delegate of obj * QueryContinueDragEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示一个将处理路由事件的方法，拖动源（例如 ）可以利用该方法取消拖放事件。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the routed events that enables a drag-and-drop operation to be canceled by the drag source, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用下列附加事件使用此委托：This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - 此委托还用于基元素上的以下路由事件。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 这些路由的事件将转发前面列出的附加的事件，以使其更方便地访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - 附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据和浮升和隧道路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 路由事件过程，这可能会影响事件的处理的特征。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 附加的事件在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The attached event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
